attributes.action: sack Maggie Atkinson as the Children's Commissioner immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ed Balls ignored recommendations from the select committee about Maggie Atkinson and now she has both insulted Jamie Bulger's mother, shown a complete lack of understanding of public opinion, sent a clear message to young offenders and raised questions about the government's commitment to controlling crime

rejection.details: The Children's Commissioner is independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
